'''Blazed Meat Stew''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Blazed Meat Stew is found in a [[Chest]] in [[Huitztli Hill]], [[Natlan]].

Depending on the quality, Blazed Meat Stew Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by '''10'''/'''15'''/'''20'''% for 300s. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Kinich|Saurian Hunter's Reward}}
